title: Level 2: Noon shapes
description: Practice the /n/ sound in isolated, initial, medial, and final forms.
objective: Help children spot the letter Noon in every position without using full words.

steps.prompt: Hear the /n/ sound. Tap the isolated shape.
steps.hint: Find the single dot above the curve.

steps.prompt: Hear /n/ at the start. Tap its initial shape.
steps.hint: Look for the forward curve with one dot.
No connectors appear on either side.
It connects on both sides with one dot above.

steps.prompt: Match the sound to the final /n/ shape.
steps.hint: The tail lifts with a single dot above.
Pick the starting curve with one dot.
The isolated form keeps one dot above.

steps.prompt: Match the audio to the medial /n/ shape.
steps.hint: It connects on both sides with a single dot.
Choose the form that finishes with one dot.

steps.prompt: Which option shows /n/ connecting on both sides?
steps.hint: It links on both sides while keeping one dot.

steps.prompt: Spot /n/ with one dot in final form.
steps.hint: The final form ends with a lift and one dot.

steps.prompt: Great work practicing the /n/ letter shapes.
